CustomField.formula: CASE( CO_Credit_Status__c , "Ok",IMAGE('/resource/Ok','png',75,75), "Closed",IMAGE('/resource/alerticon', 'png', 75,75), "Stop Credit",IMAGE('/resource/alerticon', 'png', 75,75), "Cash On Delivery",IMAGE('/resource/alerticon', 'png', 75,75), "Awaiting Approval",IMAGE('/resource/warning', 'png', 75,75), IMAGE('/resource/Ok', 'png', 75,75))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Red = Stop Credit, Closed or COD. Green = Open. Amber = Awaiting Approval.
CustomField.label: Credit Status
